entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
